remarks: Any lower bound of a nonempty set of real numbers is less than or equal to its infimum.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Sep-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2014.)
statement:
infmrgelb $p |- ( ( ( A C_ RR /\ A =/= (/) /\ E. x e. RR A. y e. A x <_ y ) /\ B e. RR ) -> ( B <_ sup ( A , RR , `' < ) <-> A. z e. A B <_ z ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d A z $.
$d B z $.
